name: Food and Sorcery
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 41.

Uses the controls from the Winnitron: https://github.com/winnitron/WinnitronLauncher/wiki/Requirements-for-Winnitron-G...

Player 1: arrows to move, "." key to jump, "/" key to throw

Player 2: wasd to move, "`" to jump, "1" to throw

Wizard/level assets provided by  https://jessemarofke.com.

Fruit assets from Unity Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-pixel-food-113523
